IBHighSchool.requirements: "{'h4': 'N/A', 'h2': 'International Baccalaureate', 'p': [{'#text': 'International Baccalaureate Diploma, with English HL or SL.Prerequisites can be presented at the Standard or Higher Level.\xa0\xa0Be sure to check the requirements for your intended.The following IB Math courses will satisfy the CalculusAdvanced Functions prerequisites for science and business programs: Mathematics: Applications and Interpretations HL; Mathematics: Analysis and Approaches SL; and Mathematics: Analysis and Approaches HL.\xa0 \xa0Mathematics: Applications and Interpretations SL will satisfy the Advanced Functions prerequisite (only).\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Applicants who completed the pre-2021 IB curriculum may present Mathematics SL or HL to satisfy the Calculus and Advanced Functions prerequisites.\xa0 Math Studies cannot be used to satisfy a prerequisite.', 'strong': 'Minimum Admission Requirement:', 'br': ['', '', '', ''], 'a': 'area of study', 'em': 'and'}, '', '', '', '', '', '', {'#text': 'Applicants presenting IB Certificates may qualify for admission if they have completed/are completing another recognized secondary school diploma.\xa0 See:for a list of acceptable qualifications.The IB Career-related Programme is not accepted as a basis of admission to U of T degree programs.', 'a': 'Admission Requirements', 'br': ['', '']}, {'#text': 'Transfer credit may be awarded for your IB subjects.\xa0 See:for more details.Final IB results must be submitted to U of T electronically by the IBO.', 'a': 'Transfer Credit Information', 'br': ['', '']}, {'strong': 'Expanded Admission Requirements by Target Faculty'}, '', ''], 'ul': {'li': [{'a': 'Faculty of Applied Science and Engineering'}, {'a': 'Faculty of Arts & Science'}]}}"

chineseHighSchool.requirements: "{'h4': 'N/A', 'p': [{'strong': 'Minimum Admission Requirements:'}, {'#text': 'Senior High School (Upper Middle School) Graduation Diploma and Academic Proficiency Test/Upper Middle School Graduation (Hui Kao) Exam and Chinese National University Entrance Examinations (Gao Kao). Applicants not intending to write the Gao Kao must present the ACT or SAT as an alternative. \xa0Students applying for Fall 2023 admission who cannot or choose not to submit ACT or SAT results will not be disadvantaged in the admissions process; however, students who have written the SAT or ACT and wish to have these considered in their assessment are encouraged to submit their scores.\xa0 Applicants who have written AP exams are encouraged to submit their results.\xa0 Prospective students aiming for admission in Fall 2024 should visit this page in September 2023 for updated information about admission requirements.', 'a': 'Refer to the Faculty of Applied Science and Engineering for further information about studying Engineering at U of T.'}]}"

IBHighSchool.requirements: "{'h4': 'Applied Science and Engineering', 'div': {'div': {'div': {'div': {'div': {'div': {'div': {'div': {'div': {'div': {'h2': ['Candidates completing their First Assessment in May 2021 must present:', {'strong': 'Candidates who have completed the IB Diploma prior to November 2020 must present:'}], 'ul': [{'li': [{'#text': 'Mathematics — one of the following:', 'ul': {'li': ['Analysis and Approaches HL*', 'Analysis and Approaches SL', 'Applications and Interpretations HL']}}, 'Chemistry', 'Physics', 'English']}, {'li': ['Mathematics **', 'Chemistry', 'Physics', 'English']}], 'p': '* Mathematics: Analysis and Approaches HL is strongly recommended.', 'div': {'p': '** Recommended at the Higher Level; Math Studies is not acceptable.'}}}}}}}}, 'p': ['Where it is not indicated, prerequisite courses can be completed at either the Standard or Higher Level. While the Committee accepts Standard Level (SL) courses, additional consideration is given for prerequisite courses completed at the Higher Level (HL). chineseHighSchool.requirements: "{'h4': 'N/A', 'p': [{'strong': 'Minimum Admission Requirements:'}, {'#text': 'Senior High School (Upper Middle School) Graduation Diploma and Academic Proficiency Test/Upper Middle School Graduation (Hui Kao) Exam and Chinese National University Entrance Examinations (Gao Kao). Applicants not intending to write the Gao Kao must present the ACT or SAT as an alternative. \xa0Students applying for Fall 2023 admission who cannot or choose not to submit ACT or SAT results will not be disadvantaged in the admissions process; however, students who have written the SAT or ACT and wish to have these considered in their assessment are encouraged to submit their scores.\xa0 Applicants who have written AP exams are encouraged to submit their results.\xa0 Prospective students aiming for admission in Fall 2024 should visit this page in September 2023 for updated information about admission requirements.', 'a': 'Refer to the Faculty of Applied Science and Engineering for further information about studying Engineering at U of T.'}]}"

minor.introduction: This unique program is designed for exceptional musicians who are interested in combining their artistic and technical pursuits. Through our partnership with the Faculty of Music, engineering students will have access to a performance-based program, including courses typically only offered to music students.

Additional points awarded for Theory of Knowledge and the Extended Essay are not considered by the Admissions Committee.', 'Although most programs require higher scores, applicants must have a minimum predicted score of at least 30 (excluding ToK and EE points) with a minimum score of 4 in prerequisite subjects, in order to be considered for admission. Please note that the Faculty of Applied Science & Engineering does not grant advanced standing credit for courses completed in the IB Diploma program.', {'#text': 'If you are an Out of Province High School student completing the IB Diploma, your application will be reviewed on the basis of your overall academic record. IBHighSchool.requirements: "{'h4': 'Music', 'h2': 'International Baccalaureate', 'p': [{'#text': 'International Baccalaureate Diploma, with English HL or SL.Prerequisites can be presented at the Standard or Higher Level.\xa0\xa0Be sure to check the requirements for your intended.The following IB Math courses will satisfy the CalculusAdvanced Functions prerequisites for science and business programs: Mathematics: Applications and Interpretations HL; Mathematics: Analysis and Approaches SL; and Mathematics: Analysis and Approaches HL.\xa0 \xa0Mathematics: Applications and Interpretations SL will satisfy the Advanced Functions prerequisite (only).\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Applicants who completed the pre-2021 IB curriculum may present Mathematics SL or HL to satisfy the Calculus and Advanced Functions prerequisites.\xa0 Math Studies cannot be used to satisfy a prerequisite.', 'strong': 'Minimum Admission Requirement:', 'br': ['', '', '', ''], 'a': 'area of study', 'em': 'and'}, '', '', '', '', '', '', {'#text': 'Applicants presenting IB Certificates may qualify for admission if they have completed/are completing another recognized secondary school diploma.\xa0 See:for a list of acceptable qualifications.The IB Career-related Programme is not accepted as a basis of admission to U of T degree programs.', 'a': 'Admission Requirements', 'br': ['', '']}, {'#text': 'Transfer credit may be awarded for your IB subjects.\xa0 See:for more details.Final IB results must be submitted to U of T electronically by the IBO.', 'a': 'Transfer Credit Information', 'br': ['', '']}, {'strong': 'Expanded Admission Requirements by Target Faculty'}, '', ''], 'ul': {'li': [{'a': 'Faculty of Applied Science and Engineering'}, {'a': 'Faculty of Arts & Science'}]}}"
